column20:
Getting back to the home page without using the back button is annoying. 
There was some major confusion between the Webcam streams and Webcam Image Archive.
column21: Simpler interface and easy to navigate back to the page. Is there any possibility of listing a sort of trending information..? Maybe add like some live streamed of one of the stations or have it be something you can select.
column22: I would suggest adding a list for the weather stations and/or maybe an icon that demonstrates the sites.
On the geospacial search, it was confusing at first as to which parts of the interface to click first, and what conditions would be needed to be met to download / visualize data.

column21: I couldn't figure out how to switch between the different parts. Also there should be a link to the about me.

column20: It was hard to find map locations
column22: It would be easier to search for locations by key terms rather than the map, if that feature is possible, I missed it.
Maybe a way to do a broad search by site

column20: The initial (i.e., first-clicked) menu items were not clear; they were not intuitive as to what they would do
column21: The first-clicked menu items were slightly more clear, and experience helped me move through the selections a little faster

column20: Some of the options at the bottom were not obvious at first
column21: The mian page seemed overall well
column22: A map option would be good if used with a list view also.

column20: Navigation between some of the services is difficult as the nav bar disappears.
column21: Exiting a pop up window for services may not be intuitive for some people.
column22: Keep a persistent nav bar  at top so it's always possible to get back and easy to navigate

column20: The navigation menu should be accessible from all the modules; also the layout looked a littled outdated.
column22: I feel as though the image retrieval (the one which makes composite videos) UI throws too much information at you all at once.
